entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
